Contact & Location
Located only seven miles south of downtown St. Augustine and a few blocks from the beach, our 208 site park is the perfect vacation getaway for you and your family! We offer a variety of pull-through sites, grassy sites, patio sites, and 30 and 50 AMP sites that will make your camping experience one you won‚Äôt forget!
Our Email
reservations@oceangrovervresort.com

(904) 471-3414

WINNER OF THE 2024 CAMPSPOT AWARDS üèÜ
Ocean Grove RV Resort is proud to announce that we‚Äôve been recognized as a
2024 CAMPSPOT Awards Winner
, ranking among the
Top Campgrounds in the US
and the
Top Campgrounds for Fishing!
Grab your fishing gear and enjoy a one-of-a-kind experience at our exclusive fishing pier! Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned angler or a beginner, our serene surroundings provide the perfect setting for your next big catch. Reel in fresh fish and make memories that last a lifetime.
Ready to cast your line?
Reserve your spot now
and experience what makes Ocean Grove RV Resort a top destination for fishing enthusiasts.
Read more about our award here!
Winner of Booking.com's 2023 Traveller Review¬†Award
Ocean Grove RV Resort is thrilled to announce that we have been awarded Booking.com‚Äôs 2023 Traveller Review Award. This accolade is a testament to the hard work and dedication of our team, who strive to provide the best possible experience for our¬†guests.
Our guests have spoken, and we couldn‚Äôt be more proud of the feedback they‚Äôve given. From the sparkling clean facilities to the friendly and welcoming staff, we are constantly working to ensure that our guests have the best vacation possible.
Thank you to everyone who has stayed with us and for your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back to Ocean Grove RV Resort!
Best of St. Augustine Awards - Ocean Grove RV Resort
We are happy to announce that Ocean Grove RV Resort has been selected as the winner of the 2022 Best of St. Augustine Awards in the Campground category.
Each year, the St. Augustine Award Program chooses only the best local businesses in and around the St. Augustine area. The program focuses on companies that have demonstrated their ability to use various marketing methods to grow their business in spite of difficult economic times. The companies chosen exemplify the best of small businesses, often leading through customer service and community involvement.
Ocean Grove RV¬†Resort
Featured in RV Lifestyle¬†Mag
With a happy heart, we are glad to share that we have been featured in one of Canada‚Äôs most well-known magazines, RV Lifestyle Magazine!
The Ocean Grove RV Resort family would like to express their gratitude for your continued love and support as we embarked on this journey together.
Click
here
to read the entire article.
St. Augustine Named Best Small Town By Southern Living
If you‚Äôre looking for a charming small town to visit, St. Augustine, Florida is a must-see destination. With its cobblestone streets, historic architecture, and stunning beaches, St. Augustine has something for everyone. And if you‚Äôre looking for a comfortable place to stay during your visit, Ocean Grove RV Resort is the place for you! This resort offers top-notch amenities, including a pool, hot tub, and clubhouse, all while being located just minutes away from St. Augustine‚Äôs main attractions. Whether you‚Äôre a history buff or just looking to relax on the beach, St. Augustine and Ocean Grove RV Resort are the perfect combinations for your next vacation.
Click
here
to read the entire article.

Create a memorable camping experience with friends and family at Ocean Grove RV Resort!
Blocks away from St. Augustine Beach and seven miles south of the historic district, Ocean Grove RV Park has various options to suit your camping style and needs! Do you prefer premium sites or a beautiful marsh view site? We got you covered!
All year long, we offer a variety of activities for our campers, such as card games, holiday parties, sports, swimming, and much more.
Stay as busy as you want, or kick back, relax, and enjoy your stay! We offer an unforgettable experience to all of our visitors in a breathtaking setting.
Enjoy your vacation and make your reservation with us immediately.
Why Choose Us
Whether you are looking for a site with shady palm trees or a grassy location, one of our 208 sites will fit just what you need! We take pride in our park and continuously look for ways to improve and enhance your experience at our resort. We offer several activities year-round for our campers, such as card games, holiday parties, sports, swimming, and many more. Stay as busy as you want, or simply kick back, relax and enjoy your stay.
Make Your Reservation
Take a Virtual Tour
RV Resort Photos
